subject: ATTENTION
body:
ATTENTION
This is Mr John Pearson the CEO of DHL Courier Company, I have been
trying to reach you just to inform you that your fund is worth
$4,800,000. 00. (Four million Eight Hundred Thousand United States
Dollars) have been approved in your favor with a bank which has
already opened an account and issued to you ATM CARD, The ATM CARD is
withdrawable from any ATM Machine in the world and it has been
registered to our office for the delivery of your ATM CARD package,
Kindly Reconfirm the below information to me and make sure your
address is writing correctly to avoid wrongful delivery of your ATM
CARD to a wrong address
1) YOUR FULL NAME:....
2) YOUR COUNTRY:.....
3) YOUR ADDRESS:......
4) YOUR PHONE NUMBER:.....
5) YOUR OCCUPATION:.......
6) YOUR NEAREST AIRPORT:.....
Upon the receipt of your mailing address we shall proceed for the
delivery of your ATM CARD to your home address So feel free and
contact me back with your full delivery information thanks
Best Regards,
Mr John Pearson
DHL Express Courier Company CEO
(Chief Executive Officer)
Email: 
johnpearsondhlexpressceo@gmail.com
Cell No: +1(626)344-8001

subject: Re: ATTENTION
body:
Hello Mr. John Pearson,

I'm delighted to hear from you and the news about the ATM CARD is quite surprising! I appreciate your efforts in trying to reach me.

Before we proceed, could you please provide more details about this fund? How did it come to be approved in my favor? Also, I'd like to know more about how the ATM CARD works. Is there a specific limit on withdrawals per day?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re: ATTENTION
body:
Hello how are you doing today? I hope you are doing well. I received your
email and it was well scrutinized and understood.

First of all, i wants you to know that all the necessary arrangements
regarding the delivery of this ATM CARD has been made and as soon as you
comply with the necessary requirements the delivery will commence with
immediate effect. However, your information as was stated in the first
email is required.

This is as result of an online email selected program done annually as the
medium to eradicate poverty around the World and to help some suffering
industries/ company globally. Your email was one of the lucky selected
emails which makes you one of the beneficiaries to receive the total sum of
$4,800,000.00 dollars in form of ATM VISA CARD. This delivery is mandatory
depending on your country as it is scheduled.

The said ATM VISA CARD is limited to make maximum withdrawal. Daily
withdrawal limits typically range from $5,000 to $20,000 and can be
upgraded if the beneficiary is qualify to which is determined by the
beneficiary professions.

I believe this has answered all your questions and also the delivery has
been approved by the United States President and issued an approval letter.
Which was signed by the U.S Supreme Court of Justice so i wants you to act
towards this so we can get the transactions moving.

Thanks for your understanding.
Best Regards,
Mr. John Pearson.







, Michelle <up19088@***.com> wrote:
